imdb.title: Free!
imdb.plot: Free! revolves around members of a high school boy's swimming team. Four boys-Haruka, Makoto, Nagisa and Rin-all participated in a swimming tournament shortly before graduating elementary school and later parted ways. Years later,...

episodes.title: Makoto's Worries!/Member Recruitment!
episodes.plot: First OVA: Makoto and Nagisa try to deduce how much water it takes for Haruka to want to take off his clothes and dive into it. Later, the three think up ideas on how to recruit new members.

episodes.title: Rin and Nitori's Week!/Rei's Intense Diving Training!
episodes.plot: Second OVA "FrFr!". Rin helps Nitori study, but is put off by his messy desk. Rei dreams about diving.

episodes.title: OVA: Rei, Theories, and Speedos!/The Iwatobi Clan!/Distant FrFr!
episodes.plot: Third OVA. Nagisa, Haruka and Makoto help Rei pick out a swimsuit. Rin watches the swim club kick upside down. The swim club is curious about Haruka's laughter.

episodes.title: Prologue
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Sprouting Dive Start!
episodes.plot: Haruka has entered Hidaka University, where he's now training with the swim club to prepare for a newcomer tournament. One day, he runs into Asahi, a swim teammate from middle school. Haruka is later joined by Makoto, who also moved to Tokyo, at a coffee shop to catch up with Asahi - and the topic quickly turns to Ikuya, another teammate they swam with in middle school. On the day of the newcomer tournament, Haruka and Asahi are in the same race for the first time in years - and the spectacle is watched by Hiyori, who calls Haruka an "inferior copy of Ikuya." After ...

episodes.title: A Promise on a Shooting Star!
episodes.plot: Haruka and his relay teammates decide to hold a training camp in the summer of their second year of middle school. During the night, Haruka heads out to the pool and finds Ikuya looking up at the stars.

episodes.title: First Swim in Another Country!
episodes.plot: Rin, now living in Australia, trains hard every day with swimmers from all around the world. Then a Japanese guy shows up where his team is training, challenging each of his teammates to races and beating them one by one. Even Rin is surprised when this newcomer reveals his identity.

episodes.title: Interference of Loss!
episodes.plot: Haru, Makoto, and Asahi visit Shimogami University in hopes of talking to Ikuya, but even after looking all over campus, they can't find him. Hiyori, however, notices them and makes it his mission to keep them from seeing Ikuya.

episodes.title: An Ominous Workout!
episodes.plot: The Iwatobi High School Swim Club is participating in a joint training camp with the Samezuka Academy and Soufuukan High School teams. Sousuke is also participating as an alumnus. In the midst of the excitement, Rei and Nagisa notice that something is odd about Romio's swimming. Then Shizuru tells them the story of what happened to Romio in middle school.

episodes.title: The Mermaid of the Abyss!
episodes.plot: Hiyori still remembers the first time he saw Ikuya smile. Both boys grew stronger through rigorous training while they studied abroad in America - but seeing Haruka threw Ikuya off his stride. Now Hiyori wishes Ikuya would just forget about Haruka for good.

episodes.title: A Solitary Medley!
episodes.plot: With the college championships approaching, all the swimmers are training hard on their own in addition to their official club practices. Haruka is also undergoing some extra training, with coaching from the mysterious man they've been seeing around campus. Makoto is concerned about the arrangement, but Haruka assures him that he asked for the help himself.

episodes.title: Metamorphosis of the Soul!
episodes.plot: After the breakup of his middle school swim team, Ikuya decided to get stronger on his own and not rely on anyone. But Haruka, breaking out of his freestyle comfort zone to swim in the individual medley, tells Ikuya that he's not alone.

episodes.title: Interval in the Evening Calm!
episodes.plot: Haruka's next race is the All-Japan Invitational, which determines who will represent Japan at the global level. To prepare for this important tournament, Haruka is invited to a special training camp.

episodes.title: The Grab Start of Hope!
episodes.plot: Makoto has been unable to get in touch with Haruka following the friendly race at his training camp, making him worry that Haruka is dwelling on what happened. Then Nao approaches Makoto to tell him about a rumor he heard.

episodes.title: Streamline of Unity!
episodes.plot: Makoto meets up with the members of the Iwatobi Swim Club who are in Tokyo for the nationals. Meanwhile, Haru continues his training.

episodes.title: Dive to the Future!
episodes.plot: Nagisa, Rei, and the rest of the Iwatobi Swim Club have come to cheer on their former teammates at the All-Japan Invitational. Makoto tells them the story of how ever since Haruka swam for the first time, he'd been swimming only freestyle.

episodes.title: Stormy Dive-Dash!
episodes.plot: While many things remain the same, the beginning of spring brings new experiences for the Iwatobi Swim Club.

episodes.title: Stroke of an Unexpected Meeting!
episodes.plot: While the third years worry about their futures, the Iwatobi Swim Club helps with the grand opening of the Iwatobi SC Returns.

episodes.title: The Butterfly of Farewell!
episodes.plot: Rei's been acting strange since the inter-club relay, and Nagisa and the others try to find out why.

episodes.title: The Promise's Somersault Turn!
episodes.plot: While Samezuka gears up for the prefectural tournament, Gou tries to make sure the boys at Iwatobi are eating nutritionally balanced meals.

episodes.title: A Resolution's Heads-Up!
episodes.plot: Nagisa is acting strange, but he won't tell the other club members why. How will they find out and help him?

episodes.title: Invincible Prime!
episodes.plot: The prefectural tournament begins, starting with the individual races. Will Iwatobi make it through the preliminaries?

episodes.title: The Crouching Start of Vindication!
episodes.plot: It's finally the day of the medley relay. Who will win, Iwatobi or Samezuka?

episodes.title: The Locomotive of a Twist!
episodes.plot: Makoto meets a boy who hates swimming while helping out at Coach Sasabe's swimming club and is determined to teach him how to swim.

episodes.title: Forming of a Slump!
episodes.plot: Haru feels the pressure of everyone's expectations as the regional tournament draws near.

episodes.title: The Six-Beat Kick of Tears!
episodes.plot: Rin confronts Sosuke about his injury and learns more about Sosuke's past before they swim their medley relay.

episodes.title: The Open Turn of Destiny!
episodes.plot: Iwatobi High celebrates their swim club making it to nationals, but the swimmers have to deal with some issues before they will be ready to compete.

episodes.title: A Swim-Off in a Foreign Land!
episodes.plot: Rin shows Haru around places important to him in Australia and tells Haru about his experience studying abroad.

episodes.title: The Eternal Summer of Beginnings!
episodes.plot: Leading into the national tournament, the boys look back on their journeys and talk about what they will do in the future.

episodes.title: OVA: Forbidden All Hard!
episodes.plot: Haruka and the others go to Samezuka Academy's Culture Festival, where Rin and the rest of the swimming club are hosting a maid café. Both the Iwatobi and Samezuka teams decide to participate in a watergun survival game across the campus, with Haruka, Sousuke, Nagisa, and Momotarou on one team and Rin, Makoto, Rei, and Aiichirou on the other. After several mishaps and plans gone astray, the match boils down to a standoff between Haruka and Rin, which Rin wins due to Haruka's affinity for water. At the end of the day, the eight of them take the time to get to know each...

episodes.title: Saikai no sutâtingu burokku!
episodes.plot: Haruka has always loved the water and hated competition. So much so he never joined his school's swim club. But a run in with former teammate, Rin, changes everything and suddenly Haru's friends pull him into reforming the Iwatobi Swim Club!

episodes.title: Tsuioku no disutansu!
episodes.plot: It's Haru vs Rin in a long awaited match. But the results shock everyone. Meanwhile, the pieces begin to fall into place for the revival of the Iwatobi Swim Club. With the help of Rin's sister, Gou, their club may finally come to life!

episodes.title: Riron no dorufin kikku!
episodes.plot: In order to compete, the Iwatobi Swim Club needs one more member and Nagisa has his sights on the athletic Rei-who is currently part of the track team. But Nagisa refuses to give up and seeks different ways to recruit him.

episodes.title: Toraware no batafurai!
episodes.plot: With a full team, the Iwatobi Swim Club is ready for anything! Except, their newest member isn't faring well in the water. Nothing a swimsuit shopping trip can't fix, right?

episodes.title: Ôpun wôtâ de taiken!
episodes.plot: The boys of Iwatobi Swim Club start their intense training and do so in style-by camping! While everyone trains their hardest, Rei feels like he's falling behind and tries to push himself. But danger lies in waves!

episodes.title: Shôgeki no nôburîjingu!
episodes.plot: A daring rescue and a search for motivation. The boys come together and share their reason and drive to swim. But when Rei brings up Makoto's odd behavior, a past is revealed.

episodes.title: Kessen no sutairu wan!
episodes.plot: Prefecturals are just around the corner but the boys of Iwatobi are getting better and ready to compete! Meanwhile, Rin faces his own reasons for swimming as he preps for the upcoming tournament.

episodes.title: Gyakushû no medorê!
episodes.plot: It's time to see if all that hard work and practice paid off! The boys show their stuff in the individual events while Rin watches on. But the real challenge awaits in the medley relay.

episodes.title: Mayoi no rûzun appu!
episodes.plot: With the prefecturals over, the boys of Iwatobi Swim Club take pride in the progress they've made together. And with time to relax, it's festival time! In order to avoid an awkward situation, Nagisa makes Rei follow Rin around to keep him away from Haru!

episodes.title: Iradachi no hâto reito!
episodes.plot: It's time to start training again and this time with help from Coach Sasabe! But there's a bit of unease as Rei feels left out not knowing the rest of the team's history with Rin. Frustrated, Rei expresses his feelings and Haru opens up.

episodes.title: Gekijô no ôru auto!
episodes.plot: Finally in the know of the history with Rin, Rei goes to Samezuka Academy to talk with him. The night before regionals, Rin finally expresses his feelings about the relay to Rei. And finally, Samezuka announces their relay lineup!

episodes.title: Harukanaru furî!
episodes.plot: To make it to nationals, the boys of Iwatobi must win! But the closer the tournament gets, the more nervous they become. Whereas Rin just grows more and more irritated. When it's time for them to shine-will Iwatobi get the gold?!
